name: First Person Shooter Game Beta 0.2
description:
Just Walk Around And Jump In A Map. This Was A Test And In Future It Will Be A FPS Game If Possible...... There Is A Windows Version And An Android Version Of The Game (idk If You  Can Call This A Game).

This Is The First Beta Edition 0.1 - https://sahaldev.itch.io/first-person-game-beta-01
Since This Beta, I've Added Some Enemy Bots Which Follows But Not Hurt You, Gave yourself A Gun To Kill Bots, Pause Menu, Updated Menu And Updated Map.
